name: aria-browser
description: Headless browser for web access — navigate, snapshot, screenshot, and scrape pages via the aria-browser (browserless/chrome) service.
author: Aria Blue

tools.name: navigate
tools.description: Navigate to a URL and return the full page HTML content, title, and status. Use this for fetching complete web pages or checking service responses. Returns HTML body, page title, and HTTP status.

url.description: The URL to navigate to (e.g. https://example.com or http://aria-api:8000/health)

wait_for.description: Optional CSS selector to wait for before capturing content (e.g. '#main', '.loaded')

tools.name: snapshot
tools.description: Take a structured snapshot of a web page — extracts title, headings, links, meta tags, and visible text. More useful than raw HTML for understanding page content.

selectors.description: Optional CSS selectors to extract (default: title, h1-h3, p, a, meta). Each selector returns matching elements with text and attributes.

tools.name: screenshot
tools.description: Capture a PNG screenshot of a web page. Returns a base64-encoded image. Useful for visual verification of page rendering.

full_page.description: Capture full scrollable page (default: false, viewport only)

tools.name: scrape
tools.description: Extract specific elements from a web page by CSS selector. Returns text, HTML, and attributes for each matching element. Use for targeted data extraction.

elements.description: Array of CSS selectors to extract
